name: 【﻿Ｈｏｍｅ】
description:
Home: A platformer about a mother returning home.

The world has been overrun with monsters that have been wreaking havoc in cities and suburbs. After scavenging for supplies Mother returns to her home in the forest during the night while the monsters are asleep. 

Run and jump between cliffs, caves, and trees to help Mother navigate through the dark to return home safely.  Follow the rope trail and collect batteries to help find your way through the dark. Beware the sleeping monsters lingering in the shadows.


Features:
- 9 levels
- Simple platformer mechanics
- Find your way with limited light
- Collect batteries to power up
- Avoid enemies

Controls:
Use WASD for movement
R resets the level
ESC exits fullscreen
